about_the_game:
Isle of Dinosaurs 2D or simply IOD is a classic action-adventure maze game with pixel art graphics
featuring two playable characters, co-op gameplay and dinosaurs.

You accidentally teleport into another world by discovering a secret portal
in your grandpa backyard.

Welcome to IOD, a prehistoric realm that is filled with different
dinosaurs and other mysterious creatures.

Key Features


* 2d pixel art graphics
* top-down view of the world
* warm colors, classic pixel art key-frames animations
* PG-13 friendly story and gameplay (Nintendo like)
* no flashes, no screen shakes, no particles generated in excess
* co-op, shared keyboard or keyboard + controller
* dinosaurs

Characters


You can choose between playing a boy or girl:



Dinosaurs NPCs:

- young and elder Anky

- young and elder Rex

- young and elder Ptery

* New dinosaurs will be announced after full implementation is ready.
* Initial demo will contain these 3 dinosaurs.

Gameplay


* Maps are maze like, you have to collect powerups and items that will help you teleport back home.
* You will face mini-challenges and mini-games.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 and later
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 570 or similar
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 570 or similar
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Isle of Dinosaurs 2D

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 570 or similar
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: You got teleported into a prehistoric world. It's time to show the inhabiting dinosaurs why you are not extinct and return back home.
